import React, { useState } from 'react'; import {useAllContext} from '../../App'; import '../../Styles/Sidebar.css'; import AppLogo from '../../Images/app-logo.png'; const Sidebar = () => { const StatesAndFunctions = useAllContext(); const openAddTaskPopup = () => { StatesAndFunctions.changePopupMessageBox('add-task', {}); StatesAndFunctions.toggleSidebar(); }; return (
  • StatesAndFunctions.handleTaskConfigurationSettings('')}> Dashboard
  • StatesAndFunctions.handleTaskConfigurationSettings('Completed')}> Completed
  • StatesAndFunctions.handleTaskConfigurationSettings('In progress')}> Upcoming
) }; export default Sidebar;
